    • set

      public void set(org.simpleyaml.configuration.ConfigurationSection yml, String oldPath)
      Recursively sets configuration values from a ConfigurationSection by traversing its keys.
      Parameters:
      yml - The ConfigurationSection containing key-value pairs.
      oldPath - The existing path for nested sections, used to build the full key path.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the current configuration state of the object and the YAML structure, removing all values.

    • setupInstances

      public void setupInstances(String path, Class<?> clazz, Object instance) throws Exception
      Recursively initializes instances of fields annotated with @Create in the given class.
      Parameters:
      path - The current path to the field, used for hierarchical structure.
      clazz - The class containing fields to initialize.
      instance - The instance of the class to which the fields belong.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue accessing or instantiating fields.

    • save

      public void save(String path, Class<?> clazz, Object instance) throws Exception
      Recursively saves field values to a YAML structure, handling comments and nested objects.
      Parameters:
      path - The current path to the field for YAML hierarchy.
      clazz - The class containing fields to save.
      instance - The instance of the class whose fields are saved.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue accessing or setting field values.
